comment.text: This translation key is used to display a reminder message when unsaved changes are made to a form or settings, prompting the user to save their work before leaving the page. It appears in various UI elements such as save buttons and dialogs, alerting users of potential data loss. The translation should convey a clear warning without being too intrusive.

usage.context:
<SaveCancelButtons
 className={styles.saveCancelButtons}
 onSaveClick={onSave}
 onCancelClick={onCancel}
 showReminder={showReminder}
 reminderText={t("Common:YouHaveUnsavedChanges")}
 saveButtonLabel={t("Common:SaveButton")}
 cancelButtonLabel={t("Common:CancelButton")}
 displaySettings
 hasScroll={false}
 isSaving={isSaving}

<SaveCancelButtons
 className="save-cancel-buttons"
 onSaveClick={onSave}
 onCancelClick={onCancel}
 showReminder={showReminder}
 reminderText={t("Common:YouHaveUnsavedChanges")}
 saveButtonLabel={t("Common:SaveButton")}
 cancelButtonLabel={t("Common:CancelButton")}
 displaySettings
 hasScroll={false}
 isSaving={isSaving}

<SaveCancelButtons
 onSaveClick={onSubmit}
 onCancelClick={onReset}
 saveButtonLabel={t("Common:SaveButton")}
 cancelButtonLabel={t("Settings:DefaultSettings")}
 reminderText={t("Common:YouHaveUnsavedChanges")}
 saveButtonDisabled={saveButtonDisabled}
 disableRestoreToDefault={
 isDefaultSettings || isSaveLoading || isResetLoading
 }
 displaySettings

<SaveCancelButtons
 className="save-cancel-buttons"
 onSaveClick={onSaveClick}
 onCancelClick={onCancelClick}
 showReminder={showReminder}
 reminderText={t("Common:YouHaveUnsavedChanges")}
 saveButtonLabel={t("Common:SaveButton")}
 cancelButtonLabel={t("Common:CancelButton")}

 hasScroll={false}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "لقد قمت بعدم حفظ التغييرات" literally translates to "You have done not saving the changes." It's an awkward and unnatural phrasing in Arabic. A more natural and accurate translation would convey the meaning of 'unsaved changes' more directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لديك تغييرات لم تحفظ (Ladayka taghyyratun lam tahfath)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'dəyişiklikləriniz' is misspelled. It should be 'dəyişikliklərin var'.
The French translation 'Vous avec des modifications non-sauvegardées' contains a grammatical error. 'avec' should be 'avez'.

The Armenian translation 'Դուք չպահված փոփոխություններ ունեք' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Armenian. It can be improved for better readability and user experience. A more natural phrasing would use a more common construction for expressing 'unsaved changes'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Ձեր փոփոխությունները դեռ չեն պահպանվել' (Dzer popoxut'yunnerner dter chen p'ahpanvel) which translates to 'Your changes have not yet been saved.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "未保存変更はあります。" while technically correct, sounds somewhat formal and stiff for a user-facing message. A more natural and user-friendly phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 変更が保存されていません。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Nu ați salvat modificările efectuate de dvs' is overly formal and verbose for a typical user interface message like 'You have unsaved changes.' The phrase 'efectuate de dvs' (made by you) is unnecessary and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural and concise translation would be 'Aveți modificări nesalvate' or 'Modificări nesalvate'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks consistency in capitalization.  While Romanian capitalization rules are different from English, for UI elements, maintaining a lowercase start is often preferable for consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider starting the translation with a lowercase 'a' - 'aveți modificări nesalvate'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Имате несачуване промене' is not a correct translation of "You have unsaved changes." The term 'несачуване' is not standard Serbian. It appears to be a combination of words that doesn't convey the intended meaning clearly. 'Промене' is also an unusual construction in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: You have unsaved changes should be translated as 'Имате несaчуване измене' or 'Имате неизвршене измене'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'промене' is likely a misspelling of 'измене'.
The word 'nesačuvane' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'nesačuvane'.

While the translation is understandable, 'Bạn có các thay đổi chưa được lưu' is a bit literal and not the most natural way to express 'You have unsaved changes' in Vietnamese. A more idiomatic translation would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bạn có những thay đổi chưa lưu
